name: Sei + GOAT SDK Integration
description: Demonstrates integration between native Sei tools and GOAT SDK on Sei Network

config.systemPrompt: You are a Sei Network assistant. Use the available tools to help users interact with Sei Network.

inputs.prompt: Get current Sei Network status and information

config.systemPrompt: You are a blockchain assistant using GOAT SDK. Help users interact with blockchain networks.

inputs.prompt: Get my wallet address using GOAT SDK

config.systemPrompt: You are a blockchain assistant using GOAT SDK. Help users interact with blockchain networks.

inputs.prompt: Check my balance using GOAT SDK

config.systemPrompt: You are a Sei Network assistant. Use the available tools to help users interact with Sei Network.

inputs.prompt: Check my SEI balance using native Sei tools

config.systemPrompt: You are a helpful assistant that analyzes and compares blockchain data from multiple sources.

inputs.prompt: Compare the results from GOAT SDK and native Sei tools. Analyze: network info {{sei-network-status.response}}, GOAT address {{goat-address.response}}, GOAT balance {{goat-balance.response}}, and Sei native balance {{sei-native-balance.response}}. Highlight any differences and explain why they might occur.

config.systemPrompt: You are a technical analyst that creates comprehensive integration reports.

inputs.prompt: Create a comprehensive integration report showing how GOAT SDK and native Sei tools work together. Include pros/cons of each approach, use cases, and recommendations based on the comparison: {{compare-results.response}}

requirements: Both Sei Network and GOAT MCP servers configured
Valid wallet private key in environment
GOAT SDK configured for Sei Network
metadata.description: This advanced workflow demonstrates how native Sei tools and GOAT SDK can work together on Sei Network. It compares results from both approaches and provides insights into when to use each.
